description: This file is a shell script that manages RFC service startup and configuration by sourcing properties files, handling build types, and launching the RFC base script if a lock file is not present.

methods.name: echo_t
methods.description: A function used for logging or printing messages with a specific format or destination, called in the script to log the RFC status.

calls: echo_t "RFC: Service in progress. New instance not allowed. Lock file $RFC_SERVICE_LOCK is locked!"
